jcuda.jcublas.context

Class JCudaBandwidthTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • jcuda.jcublas.context.JCudaBandwidthTest

  • public class JCudaBandwidthTest
extends java.lang.Object
    A test for the bandwidth of various copying operations. This test computes the bandwidth of the data transfer from the host to the device. The host data is once allocated as pinned memory (using cudaHostAlloc) and once as pageable memory (a Java array or a direct buffer, comparable to 'malloc' in C).
